status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: I think this does what we need. Unit tests pass. Stack or Jim, want to take a look?
Patch looks innocent enough. Does it work? Only thing I'd wonder about if this is the right time to run the directory delete?
It works. I chose to put the delete statement there because that is after all the regions are offline and deleted. Do you see any problems with it?
No. +1 on patch (after opening DeleteTable and seeing where it runs). I'll add a note to the hbasck tool that it should clean up dirs that have been incompletely deleted.
